entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Musgrave Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:06 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pool's Island 4:30 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -14.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 57 %
Dewpoint: -20.9°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16 except minus 21 inland.
entry.summary: A few clouds except mainly cloudy in onshore winds with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16 except minus 21 inland. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny except mainly cloudy in onshore winds with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in onshore winds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023
